name: TooltipContent
description: Combines Portal, Positioner, and Popup components for easy tooltip rendering. Renders a <div> element.

props.name: className
props.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

props.name: render
type: ComponentRenderFn<HTMLProps<any>, State> & ReactElement<Record<string, unknown>, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>>
ComponentRenderFn<HTMLProps<any>, State> & ReactElement<Record<string, unknown>, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>> & ComponentRenderFn<...>
ComponentRenderFn<HTMLProps<any>, State> & ComponentRenderFn<HTMLProps, {}> & ReactElement<Record<string, unknown>, string | JSXElementConstructor<...>>
props.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.
